name: PUNCH CARD
description:
Climb the corporate ladder, and beat your boss at a deck-building card game of slacking off!

How long can you get away with avoiding doing your job? That depends on how well you can play your cards!
Play your cards well and experience sweet dreams, but if your boss gets the better of you, expect to see him in your nightmares!
Collect new powerful cards in your sleep! But will they be enough?
See if you can survive the work week by downloading PUNCH CARD today!

Project Management - Dev

Game Design - Adam Columbia and Nate Brauner

Programming/Development - William VB

UI/UX - Charles Haitkin

Music/Sound Design - Trevor Dodd

2D Art - Hanna Alvelais
